about.title: Who We Are
about.description: The EITA research group (Entertainment, Education, Interaction and Applied Technologies) at UFABC is dedicated to the development of serious games, interactive tools, and educational technologies grounded in scientific research. We work in an interdisciplinary manner, integrating computing, education, and innovation to generate academic and social impact. We continue the actions of the Diversão Séria project, strengthening extension, training, and capacity-building initiatives.

description.paragraph1: The group is affiliated with the Federal University of ABC (UFABC) and operates at the intersection of education, technology, and interdisciplinary research.
description.paragraph2: Our goal is to develop innovative solutions that contribute to scientific advancement and social transformation.
description.paragraph3: We work on funded projects, scientific output, student mentorship, and collaboration with national and international researchers.

eitaBanner.title: EITA? Diversão Séria? What's the difference?
eitaBanner.description1: Created in 2017, Diversão Séria started as an extension project focused on the development of serious games and on training its members and the community through workshops and hands-on activities.
eitaBanner.description2: Currently, Diversão Séria’s extension activities are carried out by the EITA team.
